title: Comparing Arrays in Shell Scripting
description: In this lab, you will learn how to compare arrays in Shell scripting. You'll work with three arrays and implement a script to find common elements among them. This exercise will enhance your understanding of array manipulation, loops, and conditional statements in shell scripting.

meta.title: Shell Scripting: Array Comparison and Common Element Detection
meta.description: Learn to compare arrays and find common elements in Shell scripting. Practice array manipulation, loops, and conditional statements to solve practical programming challenges.
meta.keywords: shell scripting, array comparison, common elements, bash arrays, for loops, conditional statements, array manipulation
